ValidationRule.description: When User Select From Dt. of Booking of PickList and Enter data in On date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Is_to_be_Paid__c ,'From Dt. of Booking') ,NOT( ISBLANK( On_date__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting From Dt. of Booking Picklist Value,You Cannot enter in "On date" field
